name: Hydrate Shampoo for Medium to Thick Hair
about: What it is: A creamy shampoo that protects hair color and deeply moisturizes medium to thick, dry hair...Hair Type: Medium and Thick..Hair Texture: Coily, Curly, Straight, and Wavy..Hair Concerns:- Dryness.- Frizz.- Color Safe..Key Benefits: - Deeply hydrates and softens dry hair.- Protects hair color and enhances vibrancy.- Highly concentrated formula allows for 75+ shampoos in a single bottle..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:- Jojoba: Moisturizes hair..- Green Tea: Promotes a healthy-looking scalp..- Sage: Supports hair follicles...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This hydrating and frizz-fighting formula includes a signature aromatherapy blend of lavender, bergamot, and patchouli and a patented Antifade Complex to protect color vibrancy and ensure lasting color payoff. It also includes sunflower seed, a UV filter, and vitamin E to fight color-depleting environmental pollutants while providing deep hydration and lasting shine. Can be used on hair with and without color treatment...Clinical Results:.Based on a consumer study of 82 people with self-perceived dry hair using a regimen of Hydrate Shampoo and Hydrate Conditioner (sold separately):.- 90% say hair looks healthy.- 92% say hair looks shiny.- 91% say hair feels smooth.- 88% of women said hair feels instantly soft.- 84% of women said hair feels intensely nourished..Based on a consumer study of 82 people with self-perceived dry hair:.- 91% say product has a creamy lather...Allure

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a dime-size amount to wet hair at the scalp..-Using your fingers, lather and work the shampoo down to the ends..-Rinse..-For extra cleansing, repeat..-For best results, follow with Hydrate Conditioner and Color Fanatic Multi-Tasking Leave-In Spray (each sold separately)...Pro Tip: Use the flower bud on the top of the bottle cap to measure the appropriate amount of shampoo to use.
